targets.query: SELECT count("duration_ms") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/)
SELECT sum("duration_ms") /1000 FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/)

SELECT sum("duration_ms") / 1000 / 60 FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "user", time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("duration_ms") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("duration_ms") /1000 FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("tempo") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("danceability") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("energy") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("instrumentalness") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("acousticness") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("speechiness") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("liveness") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("valence") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT mean("danceability") AS "avg danceability", mean("energy") AS "avg energy", mean("instrumentalness") AS "avg instrumentalness", mean("acousticness") AS "avg acousticness", mean("speechiness") AS "avg speechiness", mean("liveness") AS "avg liveness", mean("valence") AS "avg valence" FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "tempo" FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("tempo") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/ AND $timeFilter AND "hour_of_day" =~ /^([5-9]|1[0])$/)
SELECT median("tempo") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/ AND $timeFilter AND "hour_of_day" =~ /^(1[0-3])$/)
SELECT median("tempo") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/ AND $timeFilter AND "hour_of_day" =~ /^(1[4-6])$/)
SELECT median("tempo") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/ AND $timeFilter AND "hour_of_day" =~ /^(1[7-9]|2[0])$/)
SELECT median("tempo") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/ AND $timeFilter AND "hour_of_day" =~ /^(2[1-4]|[0-4])$/)

panels.title: median tempo by time of day

targets.query: SELECT sum("duration_ms") / 1000 FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/ AND $timeFilter AND "hour_of_day" =~ /^([5-9])$/)
SELECT sum("duration_ms") / 1000 FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/ AND $timeFilter AND "hour_of_day" =~ /^(1[0-3])$/)
SELECT sum("duration_ms") / 1000 FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/ AND $timeFilter AND "hour_of_day" =~ /^(1[4-6])$/)
SELECT sum("duration_ms") / 1000 FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/ AND $timeFilter AND "hour_of_day" =~ /^(1[7-9]|2[0])$/)
SELECT sum("duration_ms") / 1000 FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/ AND $timeFilter AND "hour_of_day" =~ /^(2[1-4]|[0-4])$/)
SELECT sum("duration_ms") / 1000 AS "duration" FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "genre_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/ AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY "genre", time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT sum("duration_ms") / 1000 AS "duration" FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "artists"
SELECT "duration_ms","track","artists" FROM "track_history" WHERE "track" != '' AND ( "user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT "user","service","artists","track","duration_ms" / 1000 as "duration" FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1000

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("artists") FROM (SELECT "artists","duration_ms" FROM "track_history" WHERE "user" =~ /^$user$/ AND $timeFilter)
list.label: Artist
list.name: artist
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("artists") FROM (SELECT "artists","duration_ms" FROM "track_history" WHERE "user" =~ /^$user$/ AND $timeFilter)
